summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4379 for the improvement of North 48th Street from Stone Avenue to Woodland Park Avenue; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 51818, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
